```{r example, error = TRUE}
  packageVersion("dbplyr")

R.Version()$version.string

sc <- sparklyr::spark_connect(version='2.0.2', 
   master = "local")
d1 <- copy_to(sc, data.frame(x=1:3, y=4:6), 'd1')
d2 <- copy_to(sc, data.frame(x=1:3, y=7:9), 'd2')

left_join(d1, d2, by='x')
```

```{r cleanup}
spark_disconnect(sc)
rm(list=ls())
gc(verbose = FALSE)
```
